The Beauty industry is one of the fastest growing industries in the UK

We want to appreciate the work, customer and employee care, high standards of work, development in the field of cosmetology and aesthetic medicine, which is why we have created 40 of the most popular categories in which we will award the statuette.

It doesn't matter if you run your business for a year or 20 years, you deserve to enter the competition and show your company.
